metadata.title: Amanojaku: Tonight, the Spirits Will be Resurrected!

tracks.text: A school foyer, at night
A grandfather clock strikes midnight. Flourescent lights along the hall flicker out one by one.
The middle aged man shines a flashlight on children's drawings on the hallway. He walks down the hall.
Something low to the floor approaches the man from behind.
Nothing.
He's surrounded by a green, smoky aura.
We see the school building from outside. It has a statue next to the entrance.
Pictures of several children and adults. A sketch of a neighborhood road and a modern school and classroom.
A cat on a roof sits up.
Kids run through a field under a blue sky and trees.
Kids chase a cat across a field.
Kids in swimsuits jump into a stream.
People stand on the shore and on a nearby bridge.
5 kids smile. A ripple forms in the river.
At night, a cat lies near an ivy covered gate. A girl with brown hair and braids walks by.
A black haired boy sleeps by a pool.
A purple haired girl crosses a street.
In low light, shadows of creatures dance across the road.
A child with a yellow umbrella runs near rice paddies in heavy rain.
His umbrella flies away. Ghoulish shadows walk the same path.
The brown haired girl stands in a field. A giant skeleton hovers behind her.
The girl runs.
The purple haired girl stands under a blue sky, her hair blowing in the wind.
An old school building transforms into a sketch. A cat walks near the japanese text. Ghost Stories.
Bloody text appears. Tonight, the Spirits Will Be Resurrected!! Amanojaku
Through a car window, we see trees and houses pass by.
A middle aged man, an 11 year old girl, and a 6 year old boy holding a cat sit in a car.
Ivy covers a sign reading, Amanogawa Elementary School
A moving truck rounds a corner.
A shadow flies over the window. The girl pokes her head out the window.
The truck parks in front of a house labeled Mashita. The father talks to an elderly couple. Movers enter the house carrying a wardrobe.
Satsuki and her brother throw themselves on the floor in front of a window.
Satsuki sits up, blushes, covers her skirt, and looks around.
Satsuki sticks out a tongue at the boy next door, while holding a black framed portrait.
A school sits on the side of a mountain. Below, wide steps lead down to a street and houses, surrounded by greenery. Above, construction equipment clears patches of trees.
Students mingle in front of the stairs. A white car is stopped in front.
The cat leaps out of Keiichirou's backpack and runs down the sidewalk, away from the school.
The cat, Kaya, runs up stairs lined with ivy.
An old school building, with a statue out front, emerges from the woods.
The front doors have chains around them and a sign reading, No Trespassing. The doors are slightly ajar.
Leaves blow past the statue of a man reading. The doors are wide open, the chain is broken, and the sign dangles.
A girl with long purple hair watches from the woods. A shadow flies over Satsuki and she looks around.
The purple haired girl approaches.
Our view shakes. Satsuki lurches forward.
The doors shut.
Satsuki looks behind Hajime and Leo.
The purple haired girl stands in the shadows.
She wears a middle school uniform.
The chains wrap themselves around the door handle.
They round the corner to find a statue of a man reading. A red hat sits on his head.
Hajime removes the hat, and the statue opens his eyes.
The statue closes his book. The kids run.
They stop at the base of the stairs.
Down a dark hallway, past water fountains.
Kaya hides behind a bucket.
The bulldog turns to face them.
The dog has a human face. He frowns and disappears. The cat runs further down the hallway.
Momoko opens the door to a bathroom.
Momoko stands at the 4th stall.
The door opens, revealing a squat toilet. The boys back away
Hajime backs into long hair and looks up. A ghost girl smiles and them and drops from the ceiling. They run into a hallway.
A motorcycle approaches, driven by a headless man in a white pants and jacket covered in red text.
The back of the jacket reads Mad Racing Group Extreme Evil Kyonosuke
It disappears into a wall.
The wall disappears, a blue ghost floats towards them.
The ghost is bald and wields scissors.
They run away. The ghost flies behind them, also with a scythe.
They round a corner, running. Hajime overtakes Satsuki, Keiichirou, Leo, and Momoko.
Hajime trips on a bucket.
They fall to the floor. The ghost flies over them
and turns a corner.
We see them in the entrance from above.
We approach Satsuki. She looks at us. Fade to black.
A red glowing spirit floats above them.
He's backpack sized.
He disappears. Lights spin above them.
A chandelier crashes in the middle of them.
The others smile at her.
Cubbies fall, narrowly avoiding Leo. The windows behind Satsuki shatter. Keiichirou cries.
She walks towards the ghost.
Umbrellas shake, then fly out of their basket. The red ghost smiles.
Satsuki ducks. The umbrella bore into the wall behind her.
The red ghost grows larger, filling the hallway.
They look at the red ghost, growing larger, glowing with a menacing aura.
The ghost bears fangs. The kids run.
They run through an open door.
The kids hide under a window. The ghost peers through the window, then continues down the hallway.
They look around the room. Drop cloths cover couches and tables. A desk sits at the back.
Portraits hang on the wall. One picture has fallen to the ground. Kaya crouches over it. The picture shows a woman with short brown hair.
The ghosts breaks the door. His head fills the doorway. Hajime grabs a coat rack and strikes the exterior windows.
The ghost towers over the kids. They run and crawl through a hole in the wall.
Satsuki drops the portrait. A book pops out of the back, turning to a page with a red ghost.
Amanojaku slithers through the hole in the wall.
He sees the kids run away.
Kids knock over a table.
Leo draws a circle on the floor with chalk.
Hajime searches shelves.
Leo chalks characters.
Momoko tries to strike a match.
Amanojaku destroys the table barricade and enters the science room.
Satsuki looks up in terror.
He towers over them.
The fire erupts, and the circle glows with a ghostly aura.
Amanojaku reaches for them, but stops short.
His hand turns to dust.
His body dissolves.
He sees Satsuki's book.
His body disappears.
The flame goes out. The aura fades. The kids stand in darkness, then sunlight.
They collapse.
The kids leave the old school house.
They run.
A clock shows 3 past 5.
They look around.
Cat paws
The cat runs off.
Cat Amanojaku growls. Cut to black. Credits roll.
